name: Agency | 2.0
description:
Agency 2.0 specializes in marketing, PR, copy-writing, design, advertising, video production, retail and fulfillment for crowdfunding campaigns. By focusing on a macro funding strategy that starts well in advance of your Kickstarter or Indiegogo campaign, we've successfully funded 15 most-funded $1,000,000+ crowdfunding campaigns.
With over 275+ campaigns created, Agency 2.0's consistent results and track record boil down to experience.
